titleInfo.title: Ticket to annual Christmas dance, 1961 Dec. 22

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Ticket to an annual Christmas Dance, held on Friday, December 22, 1961 at the Maxwell House Hotel Ballroom. Larry Womackâ€™s Orchestra provided the music. Cost was $1.50 a couple or $1.00 stag. The organization hosting the dance is unidentified. A handwritten notation on the back of the ticket indicates it was the last dance held at the ballroom before the catastrophic fire of Dec. 25, 1961, which destroyed the hotel. Forms part of the Hotels and Lodgings Ephemera Subject Files. 1 ticket ; b&w ; 2.25 x 3.75 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission.
